sqlReaderQuery.value:
DECLARE @CurrencyCode AS NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT @CurrencyCode = [LCY Code]
FROM dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$General Ledger Setup]

DECLARE @CountryCode AS NVARCHAR(50)
DECLARE @Company_ID AS NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT 
	@CountryCode = [Country_Region Code],
	@Company_ID = [Name]
FROM dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Company Information]

;WITH DetailedCustLedgerEntryCTE AS (
	SELECT
		[Cust_ Ledger Entry No_],
		SUM([Amount]) AS Open_Amount,
		SUM(IIF(
				[Entry Type] IN (
					1 -- Initial Entry,
					--,2 -- Application
					,3 -- Unrealized Loss,
					,4 -- Unrealized Gain,
					,5 -- Realized Loss,
					,6 -- Realized Gain,
					,7 -- Payment Discount,
					,8 -- Payment Discount (VAT Excl.),
					,9 -- Payment Discount (VAT Adjustment),
					--,10 -- Appln. Rounding,
					--,11 -- Correction of Remaining Amount,
					,12 -- Payment Tolerance,
					,13 -- Payment Discount Tolerance,
					,14 -- Payment Tolerance (VAT Excl.),
					,15 -- Payment Tolerance (VAT Adjustment),
					,16 -- Payment Discount Tolerance (VAT Excl.),
					,17 -- Payment Discount Tolerance (VAT Adjustment)
				),
				Amount, 0
			)
		) AS Invoice_Amount
	FROM
		dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Detailed Cust_ Ledg_ Entry]
	GROUP BY
		[Cust_ Ledger Entry No_]
),
DetailedCustLedgerEntryByDocumentCTE AS (
	SELECT
		[Document No_],
		MIN([Posting Date]) as Document_Date,
		SUM(IIF(
				[Entry Type] IN (
					1 -- Initial Entry,
					--,2 -- Application
					,3 -- Unrealized Loss,
					,4 -- Unrealized Gain,
					,5 -- Realized Loss,
					,6 -- Realized Gain,
					,7 -- Payment Discount,
					,8 -- Payment Discount (VAT Excl.),
					,9 -- Payment Discount (VAT Adjustment),
					--,10 -- Appln. Rounding,
					--,11 -- Correction of Remaining Amount,
					,12 -- Payment Tolerance,
					,13 -- Payment Discount Tolerance,
					,14 -- Payment Tolerance (VAT Excl.),
					,15 -- Payment Tolerance (VAT Adjustment),
					,16 -- Payment Discount Tolerance (VAT Excl.),
					,17 -- Payment Discount Tolerance (VAT Adjustment)
				),
				Amount, 0
			)
		) AS Invoice_Amount
	FROM
		dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Detailed Cust_ Ledg_ Entry]
	GROUP BY
		[Document No_]
),
ReceivedPayments as (
    select distinct [Document No_]
    from dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Bank Account Ledger Entry]
)
SELECT
	'Navision' as ERP,
	@Company_ID AS Company_ID,
	cle.[Entry No_] as CustomerLedgerEntryNumber,
	cle.[Document Date] as [Creation Date],
	cle.[Customer No_] as Customer_No ,
	c.[Name] as [Name],
	CASE 
        WHEN c.[Customer Posting Group] = 'INTERCO' THEN 'INTERCOMPANY'
        WHEN cle.[Global Dimension 1 Code] IN ('CN02', 'CN20', 'CN40', 'CN60', 'CN70', 'CN80') THEN 'GT'
		WHEN cle.[Global Dimension 1 Code] IN (
			'CN03',
			'CN10', 
			'CN30',
			'CN50',
			'CN90',
			'CN15',
			'CN55',
			'CN90') THEN 'PT'
		WHEN cle.[Global Dimension 1 Code] IN ('CN95', 'CN97') THEN 'LifeSpan'
		WHEN cle.[Global Dimension 1 Code] IN ('CQ01', 'CQ20') THEN 'HQ'
		WHEN cle.[Global Dimension 1 Code] = 'MP10' THEN 'Mega'
		ELSE NULL
	END AS Business_Unit,
	null as Region,
	cle.[Transaction No_] as Transaction_ID,
	CASE cle.[Document Type]
		when 0 THEN 'N/A'
		WHEN 1 THEN 'PAYMENT'
		WHEN 2 THEN 'INVOICE'
		WHEN 3 THEN 'CREDIT MEMO'
		WHEN 4 THEN 'FINANCE CHARGE MEMO'
		WHEN 5 THEN 'REMINDER'
		WHEN 6 THEN 'REFUND'
		ELSE 'UNKNOWN'
	END [Document_Type],
	cle.[Posting Date] as Transaction_Date,
	IIF(cle.[Currency Code] = '', @CurrencyCode, cle.[Currency Code]) as Transaction_Currency,
	NULL as REPORTING_TX_AMOUNT,
	dcle.Invoice_Amount TX_AMOUNT_APPLIED,
	IIF(cle.[Applies-to Doc_ No_]='', NULL, cle.[Applies-to Doc_ No_]) as INVOICE_NUMBER,
	dclebd.Document_Date as DOCUMENT_DATE,
	dclebd.Invoice_Amount as ORIG_TX_AMOUNT,
	sih.[Payment Method Code] as PAYMENT_METHOD,
	null as COUNTRY,
	cle.[Open]
FROM
	dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Cust_ Ledger Entry] cle
	LEFT JOIN dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Customer] c ON cle.[Customer No_]=c.[No_]
	LEFT JOIN DetailedCustLedgerEntryCTE dcle ON cle.[Entry No_] = dcle.[Cust_ Ledger Entry No_]
	LEFT JOIN DetailedCustLedgerEntryByDocumentCTE dclebd ON IIF(cle.[Applies-to Doc_ No_]='', NULL, cle.[Applies-to Doc_ No_]) = dclebd.[Document No_]
	LEFT JOIN dbo.[@{pipeline().parameters.sourceSchema}$Sales Invoice Header] sih ON cle.[Document No_] = sih.[No_]
	LEFT JOIN ReceivedPayments rec ON cle.[Document No_] = rec.[Document No_]
WHERE
	-- (CASE cle.[Document Type]
	-- 	when 0 THEN 'N/A'
	-- 	WHEN 1 THEN 'PAYMENT'
	-- 	WHEN 2 THEN 'INVOICE'
	-- 	WHEN 3 THEN 'CREDIT MEMO'
	-- 	WHEN 4 THEN 'FINANCE CHARGE MEMO'
	-- 	WHEN 5 THEN 'REMINDER'
	-- 	WHEN 6 THEN 'REFUND'
	-- 	ELSE 'UNKNOWN'
	-- END = 'PAYMENT'
	(cle.[Document Type] = 1 OR rec.[Document No_] IS NOT NULL)
	AND cle.[Posting Date] >= '1990-01-01'
